body:
Hi,
This thread is for all the Sr mods and admins I made a thread before and people said no staff is hand picked and other people said there are staff applications I want to know the right answer and a estimate of when staff apps will be up and ready

-PigZen
body_tagged:
Hi,
This thread is for all the Sr mods and admins I made a thread before and people said no staff is hand picked and other people said there are staff applications I want to know the right answer and a estimate of when staff apps will be up and ready

-PigZen
title: Sr Mods + Only Please

replies.body: We don't have an exact estimate on when they'll be up, but staff applications will eventually open up. I can assure you that it won't take too long for them to open. :)
replies.body_tagged: We don't have an exact estimate on when they'll be up, but staff applications will eventually open up. I can assure you that it won't take too long for them to open. :)

replies.body:
As TNT said, we will be opening up staff applications very soon. 

As for the common misconception between hand-picked and staff applications, both systems still exist. We were testing out hand-picked staff system up until now, but this did not mean that we had decided to eliminate the staff application system.
replies.body_tagged:
